text.tspan: Annual death rate from all causes, 1980 to 2021
The estimated annual death rate from all causes per 100,000 people.

g.text: Democratic Republic of CongoDemocratic Republic of Congo

text.tspan: Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
